contextId.information: This is the use of two words with similar meanings to add emphasis. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_doublet]])

John combines these phrases that have similar meanings to express the intense emotional distress and possible anger that Jesus experienced. AT: "he was greatly upset" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_doublet]])
contextId.quote: he was deeply moved in his spirit and was troubled
